sentence.Network_en: You can talk to Miss Quested about the Peacock Throne if you like - She's artistic they say.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果你愿意的话,你尽管同奎斯迪小姐谈孔雀宝座好啦,听人说她很风雅.

sentence.Network_en: Edward VIII had done the unthinkable and abdicated the throne.
sentence.Network_cn: 爱德华八世竟主动逊位，真是匪夷所思。

sentence.Network_en: This boy's father had been executed for conspiring against the throne.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个男孩的父亲因为密谋反对君主而被处死。

means.word_mean: 1. the golden throne of former kings of Delhi; stolen by the Persians in 1739 and subsequently lost; symbol of the former Shah of Iran

auth_sentence.content: Oil giant Exxon Mobil Corp. has reclaimed the throne.
auth_sentence.res_content: Oil giant Exxon Mobil Corp. has reclaimed the throne.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Oil giant Exxon Mobil Corp. has reclaimed the throne.

auth_sentence.content: Henry Tudor's claim to the throne was weak.
auth_sentence.res_content: Henry Tudor's claim to the throne was weak.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Henry Tudor's claim to the throne was weak.

auth_sentence.content: By this triumph...Mary was seated more strongly...on the throne.
auth_sentence.res_content: By this triumph...Mary was seated more strongly...on the throne.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: By this triumph...Mary was seated more strongly...on the throne.
